title: Issues with purchasing gift for a buddy
body: I purchased World Breaker Nautilus for my friend (thelovepriest). A few minutes later, he purchased the World Breaker Nautilus skin form the store. I guess this happened before my gift went through. I'm confused, because we both spent RP on it, and he got the skin, but one of us should have not been charged RP, or the transaction should not have gone through or something. Anyone able to help with this? Or point me in the right direction?

replies.body:
I took a look and it doesn't look like your friend was charged for their purchase. If they're still seeing a missing RP amount after restarting their client, I recommend you have your friend reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account specialists can take a look.

Let me know if you have any questions.
